name: It Lives (velociranga, kenzieallen, wistwyrm, AdamAudio, CyberGNeticS)
name_original: It Lives (velociranga, kenzieallen, wistwyrm, AdamAudio, CyberGNeticS)
description:
NOTE: The loading screen does not appear in this build. The game is loading behind the black screen, so please be patient

While walking your dog, he runs off and you hear him whine in pain. You rush to catch up, but he's nowhere to be seen. But you hear some noises coming from the old abandoned house nearby. Could he have gone inside?

You venture in to find him, but find more than you expected...

Controls

Arrow keys - movement
"m" - Toggle map
Escape key - Open menu

Objectives

Search for keys to access the upper floors and find your dog. Then make your escape, if you can. But beware, the house may not be as quiet as it seems....

The mansion is procedurally generated, so play again to try a new layout.

Credits

Coding - Velociranga, CyberGNeticS, Kenzie129

Art - Wistwyrm, CyberGNeticS

Music and Sound -AdamAudio

Vocals - Kaho Yoshida

Other Contributors -Avyary
